name: User is able to add a book into his collection from Book Store

steps.name: Get books collection for 'cc8d82b7-1b82-4528-a3ef-165d93e9cc73' user ID
Click on '9781593275846' book title-link in the books table
Click on Add To Your Collection button on book details
Click on 'Book Store Application' section title in navigation bar
Click on 'Profile' option from 'Book Store Application' in navigation bar
Check that book with '9781593275846' ISBN is displayed in the books table

labels.value: User can manage books in his collection and see them on Profile
